thread.section_title: About.com Christian Music & Gospel: What's Hot Now
thread.title: Find Christian Music Artists From A - Z
thread.title_full: Find Christian Music Artists From A - Z

title: Find Christian Music Artists From A - Z
text:
Ernie Haase + Signature Sound. Ernie Haase + Signature Sound Updated April 04, 2016 . 
Depending on who you ask or where you look, today's Christian bands can be classified in several different styles. What one radio station calls AC another may call pop/contemporary while yet another may call modern rock. The Dove's have several categories while the Grammy's call anything with christian content "Gospel." Some bands release songs that could fall in one of several genres . It can all lead to mass confusion. The A to Z Christian Bands and Artists List will list each artist/band by name, with a link to the style that you'll find them in here on the Christian Music site so you can find your favorite artist without having to dig through each possible style category. 0 - 9
